```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(scholar)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

id <- get_scholar_id(first_name = "Anthony", last_name = "Kimpton", affiliation = NA)

publications <- get_publications(id)

impact <- get_impactfactor(journals=publications$journal, max.distance = 0.1)

rank <- get_journalrank(journals=publications$journal)

table <- cbind(publications, impact, rank) %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate_if(is.factor, as.character)

history <- get_citation_history(id)

history <- get_article_cite_history(id, table[1,8])
```
